 #: model:mail.template,body_html:l10n_fr_intrastat_product.l10n_fr_intrastat_product_reminder_email_template
 msgid ""
 "\n"
 "<div style=\"font-family: 'Lucica Grande', Ubuntu, Arial, Verdana, sans-"
 "serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: #FFF; \">\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>I would like to remind you that we are approaching the deadline for the "
-"DEB for month ${object.year_month}.</p>\n"
+"EMEBI for month ${object.year_month}.</p>\n"
 "\n"
-"<p>As there were no ${object.declaration_type} DEB for that month in Odoo, a "
-"draft ${object.declaration_type} DEB has been generated automatically by "
+"<p>As there were no ${object.declaration_type} EMEBI for that month in Odoo, "
+"a draft ${object.declaration_type} EMEBI has been generated automatically by "
 "Odoo.</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "% if ctx.get('exception'):\n"
-"<p>When trying to generate the lines of the ${object.declaration_type} DEB, "
-"the following error was encountered:</p>\n"
+"<p>When trying to generate the lines of the ${object.declaration_type} "
+"EMEBI, the following error was encountered:</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>${ctx.get('error_msg')}</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>You should solve this error, then go to the menu \"Invoicing > Reporting "
-"> Intrastat > DEB\", open the ${object.declaration_type} declaration for "
+"> Intrastat > EMEBI\", open the ${object.declaration_type} declaration for "
 "month ${object.year_month} and click on the button \"Generate lines from "
 "invoices\".</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "% else:\n"
 "% if object.num_lines and object.num_lines > 0:\n"
-"<p>This draft ${object.declaration_type} DEB contains ${object."
+"<p>This draft ${object.declaration_type} EMEBI contains ${object."
 "num_decl_lines} ${object.num_decl_lines == 1 and 'line' or 'lines'}.</p>\n"
 "% else:\n"
-"<p>This draft ${object.declaration_type} DEB generated automatically by Odoo "
-"doesn't contain any line.</p>\n"
+"<p>This draft ${object.declaration_type} EMEBI generated automatically by "
+"Odoo doesn't contain any line.</p>\n"
 "% endif\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>Go and check this declaration in Odoo in the menu \"Invoicing > Reporting "
-"> Intrastat > DEB\".</p>\n"
+"> Intrastat > EMEBI\".</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "% endif\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>\n"
 "--\n"
 "Automatic e-mail sent by Odoo.\n"
 "</p>\n"
 "</div>\n"
 msgstr ""

 "serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: #FFF; \">\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>I would like to remind you that we are approaching the deadline for the "
-"DEB for month ${object.year_month}.</p>\n"
+"EMEBI for month ${object.year_month}.</p>\n"
 "\n"
-"<p>As there were no ${object.declaration_type} DEB for that month in Odoo, a "
-"draft ${object.declaration_type} DEB has been generated automatically by "
+"<p>As there were no ${object.declaration_type} EMEBI for that month in Odoo, "
+"a draft ${object.declaration_type} EMEBI has been generated automatically by "
 "Odoo.</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "% if ctx.get('exception'):\n"
-"<p>When trying to generate the lines of the ${object.declaration_type} DEB, "
-"the following error was encountered:</p>\n"
+"<p>When trying to generate the lines of the ${object.declaration_type} "
+"EMEBI, the following error was encountered:</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>${ctx.get('error_msg')}</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>You should solve this error, then go to the menu \"Invoicing > Reporting "
-"> Intrastat > DEB\", open the ${object.declaration_type} declaration for "
+"> Intrastat > EMEBI\", open the ${object.declaration_type} declaration for "
 "month ${object.year_month} and click on the button \"Generate lines from "
 "invoices\".</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "% else:\n"
 "% if object.num_lines and object.num_lines > 0:\n"
-"<p>This draft ${object.declaration_type} DEB contains ${object."
+"<p>This draft ${object.declaration_type} EMEBI contains ${object."
 "num_decl_lines} ${object.num_decl_lines == 1 and 'line' or 'lines'}.</p>\n"
 "% else:\n"
-"<p>This draft ${object.declaration_type} DEB generated automatically by Odoo "
-"doesn't contain any line.</p>\n"
+"<p>This draft ${object.declaration_type} EMEBI generated automatically by "
+"Odoo doesn't contain any line.</p>\n"
 "% endif\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>Go and check this declaration in Odoo in the menu \"Invoicing > Reporting "
-"> Intrastat > DEB\".</p>\n"
+"> Intrastat > EMEBI\".</p>\n"
 "\n"
 "% endif\n"
 "\n"
 "<p>\n"
 "--\n"
 "Automatic e-mail sent by Odoo.\n"
 "</p>\n"
 "</div>\n"
 msgstr ""
